timeline.message:
Move Hibernate Search extension code to directories named 'hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch'

Instead of just 'hibernate-search-elasticsearch'

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Rename the Hibernate Search extension artifacts to *hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch*

Instead of *hibernate-search-elasticsearch*

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Add a few keywords to the Hibernate Search extension

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Use 'hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch-quickstart' for references to the Hibernate Search quickstart

Instead of 'hibernate-search-elasticsearch-quickstart'.

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Move the Hibernate Search extension documentation to guides/hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch

Instead of guides/hibernate-search-elasticsearch

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

timeline.bodyText: I would have spaces around the +?
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -11,7 +11,7 @@
     <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
 
     <artifactId>quarkus-hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch-deployment</artifactId>
-    <name>Quarkus - Hibernate Search - Elasticsearch - Deployment</name>
+    <name>Quarkus - Hibernate Search - ORM+Elasticsearch - Deployment</name>

timeline.message:
Mention ORM in the name of Hibernate Search extensions

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Rename the configuration prefix for the Hibernate Search extension to 'quarkus.hibernate-search-orm.'

Instead of 'quarkus.hibernate-search.'.

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>

Rename the configuration prefix for the Hibernate Search extension to 'quarkus.hibernate-search-orm.'

Instead of 'quarkus.hibernate-search.'.

Signed-off-by: Yoann Rodière <yoann@hibernate.org>
